provides tools to help you manage and
monitor your environment to ensure
better performance
optimize cost and manage security it
also helps manage support cases
and automate remediation of issues to
the extent possible
aws support technology comprises of
three tools that is
aws trusted advisor aws personal health
dashboard
and aws support api now let's look into
each one of them in brief before we dive
deep

trusted advisor
that provides real-time guidance to help

following aws best practices trusted
advisor checks
help optimize your aws infrastructure
increase security performance reduce
your overall costs
and monitor service limits aws personal
health dashboard provides
alerts and remediation guidance when aws
is experiencing
events that may impact you it gives you
a personalized view into the performance
and availability of the aws services
underlying your aws resources
it also displays relevant and timely
information to help you manage events
in progress and provides proactive
notification to help you plan for

provides programmatic access to interact
with support center
and trusted advisor now let's talk about
the aws support api and what it offers
the aws support api currently provides
two different group of operations
that is support case management and
trusted advisor
support case management operation allows
managing the entire life cycle of your
aws support cases
from creating a case to resolving it it
provides
detailed information about the aws
support operations
and data types this service enables you
to manage your aws support cases
programmatically and uses
http methods that return results
in json format and trusted advisor
operations give access to the checks
provided by a trusted advisor
